ImportCompletedEmailNotification.description: The customer will get an email notification when an import has been completed.

Delimiter.title: Csv delimiter
Delimiter.description: Symbol used to separate values in CSV file

PageSize.title: Page size
PageSize.description: The number of rows read from the CSV file at a time

RemainingEstimator.title: Remaining estimator
RemainingEstimator.description: Algorithm to estimate the remaining time of the import

FileMaxSize.title: Import file max size
FileMaxSize.description: Max file size for import file

MaxErrorsCountThreshold.title: Maximum number of errors
MaxErrorsCountThreshold.description: Number of errors after which the import will be aborted

LimitOfLines.title: Limit of lines in import file
LimitOfLines.description: Max number of lines in import file
